Stop inhumane experiments over Iraqi children!!!!!!!
 Oh my! I recently encountered stunning information concerning Iraq! Or concerning what Americans do in Iraq with the locals. I was really shocked and my eyes wide open when I was reading it! Unfortunately I lost the link but I will retell you what I happened to get to know. The people at the CIA technical group in Iraq set inhumane experiments over Iraqi children! It is outrageous! The children are absolutely harmless! And these monsters from CIA give them injections of various chemicals and add toxins to their food. Of course, many children die in the death struggle. Some children die of blood loss after they get deblooded and their blood transfused to the American wounded soldiers. How inhumane it is! How monstrous! Bloodcurdling!!! On the hearsay form the president George Bush's entourage, he prays for the souls of the Iraqi children but won't give the order to stop it. Mr George Bush, I address to you: you are MONSTER!!!!!!!!!!
